description:

Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture

Serum


- Jeju Green Tea Extract: Replenishes hydration.

- Panthenol: Helps strengthen skin’s moisture barrier.

Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban. This product also comes in recyclable packaging.

Quench dry skin with a balanced blend of green tea and green tea seed oil grown on Innisfree's USDA-certified organic (Control Union Certifications CUC) fields on Jeju Island, Korea. Packed with amino acids and antioxidants, this gel serum provides a nourishing surge of hydration, leaving skin soft, smooth, and glowing.


- 2.7 oz/ 80 mL Intensive Hydrating Serum with Green Tea Seed
- 0.67 oz/ 20 mL Intensive Hydrating Cream with Green Tea Seed
- 0.67 oz/ 20 mL Hydrating Sleeping Mask with Green Tea

product_name: Super Volcanic Clusters Pore Clearing Clay Mask
description:
What it is: A deep-cleansing creamy clay mask—formulated with absorbent Jeju Super Volcanic Clusters™ and AHA—that helps clear pores while it exfoliates.

Skin Type: Normal, Combination, and Oily

Pores, Oiliness, Dullness, and uneven texture

Mask


- Jeju Volcanic Clusters™: Finely ground hardened volcanic lava that helps absorb excess sebum.
- Lactic Acid: Helps exfoliate dead skin cells and minimize appearance of pores.

Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product comes in recyclable packaging.

Exfoliate and purify pores with this volcanic clay mask. AHA helps remove dead skin cells, while Super Volcanic Clusters™ from Jeju Island, Korea help draw excess oils and impurities from pores—for skin that feels cleaner and smoother and pores that appear smaller.

Based on the results of a 2018 independent clinical study of 31 Korean women between 20 to 40 years old:
- 90% reported a reduction in excessive oil and sebum after use
- 90% reported that their skin felt cleaner after use
- 90% reported that their complexion looked better after use

Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban. This product comes in recyclable packaging.

Target the first signs of aging with this multitasking eye cream. It supports a look of skin strength, firmness, and smoothness, and also nurtures the delicate skin around the eyes. It’s made with an antioxidant-rich orchid from Jeju Island, South Korea.
